content:
# The smelting process has successfully produced 1 iron plate, but it seems that it hasn't been added to my inventory yet. 
# The furnace is still working and has 7 units of iron ore left to smelt. 

# I will retrieve the produced iron plate from the furnace to add it to my inventory.
retrieve_item(furnace, Prototype.IronPlate, quantity=1)  # Retrieve 1 iron plate from the furnace.
print(f"Inventory after retrieving iron plate: {inspect_inventory()}")
print(f"Entities on the map after retrieving: {get_entities()}")
